name: PIGROMANCE
description:
❍ GAME OVERVIEW

ㆍIt is a game of the puzzle platformer genre and takes the form of making a path by solving puzzles.
ㆍThe introductory content contains only a portion of the content of the demo version.

❍ WORLDVIEW

ㆍThe story of the cuttingman and the pigs in the sausage factory.


❍ CHARACTERS

ㆍMeatlet
Like other pigs, the boy pig was born with a destiny to become a sausage. One day, he finds a girl pig running outside the low fence and becomes curious.

ㆍPorklet
The girl pig who one day escapes over a low fence and causes a commotion.

ㆍCuttingman
He is a diligent worker who does all the work in the factory, specializing in slaughtering pigs.


❍ BACKGROUND OF THE CASE

ㆍFarm
Pigs living here cannot climb over low fences.
Far from thinking of crossing the fence, they eat junk sausages from the Cuttingman, sleep and live a lazy life. The Pigs who painted cut lines on the bodies seems look Like groomed by the Cuttingman.


ㆍSausage factory
A factory that makes sausages from pigs.
When pigs raised on farms gain weight, they are taken to a sausage factory to be used as sausage material.
Many challenges await inside the factory. I hope you overcome difficulties by using the characteristics of boy pigs.
